info.title: Class Data for Classification
info.description: Classes allow you to group objects together according to criteria that you define. Using the API you can maintain class header data, descriptions, keywords, texts and characteristic assignments.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete class data with this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Enablement of SAP Excise Tax Management(4LO)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/4LO " Link To BP ")

get.summary: List of characteristics assigned to classes.
get.description: Reads all characteristic class assignments. You can also get the characteristics of a selected class.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description: Creates a class characteristic assignment using the internal ID of the class and characteristic.

get.summary: Reads class characteristic assignment for a given key.
get.description: Reads a class characteristic assignment by the internal ID of the class and characteristic.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates a class characteristic assignment using the internal ID of the class and characteristic.

delete.description: Deletes a class characteristic assignment using the internal ID of the class and characteristic.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.description: Reads all class descriptions. You can also get descriptions for a selected class or language.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description: Creates a class description using the internal ID of the class and a language. In case the language is not provided, the logon language is used.

get.summary: Class description for a given key.
get.description: Reads the description of a class in a selected language.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates the description of a class selected by the internal ID and the language.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.description: Reads all class header data. You can also retrieve the classes for a selected class type.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description: Creates a class header data using class name and class type. Providing a description in the same request is mandatory.

get.summary: Class header data for a given key.
get.description: Reads the header data of a class based on the internal ID.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates the header data of a class selected by the internal ID.

delete.description: Deletes a class based on the internal ID.

post.description: Creates a new characteristic assignment for the selected class.

get.summary: List of keywords defined for classes.
get.description: Reads all class keywords. You can also get the keywords of a selected class or language.

parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.description: Creates a class keyword on a selected language using the internal ID of the class. In case the language is not provided, the logon language is used.

get.summary: Reads a class keyword for a given key.
get.description: Reads a class keyword on a selected language by the internal ID of the class and the position number of the keyword.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates a class keyword on a selected language using the internal ID of the class and the position number of the keyword.

delete.description: Deletes a class keyword on a selected language using the internal ID of the class and the position number of the keyword.

get.summary: List of texts defined for classes.
get.description: Reads all class texts. You can also get the texts of a selected class or language.

get.summary: Reads a class text for a given key.
get.description: Reads a class text in a selected language by the internal ID of the class and text.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_ClfnClassCharcForKeyDate HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
